title: Trump Trade Tariffs Delayed, April Auto Sales Roll In, Facebook Joins Dating Game
itunes:title: Trump Trade Tariffs Delayed, April Auto Sales Roll In, Facebook Joins Dating Game
description:
Carol is joined by Bloomberg Intelligence U.S. Trade Analyst Caitlin Webber to discuss President Trump deferring a decision on whether to impose steel and aluminum tariffs on the EU, Mexico and Canada. Ryan Eller, CEO at Empire Resorts, talks about the grand opening of Resorts World Catskills. Keith Naughton, Bloomberg News Auto Reporter, breaks down April auto sales numbers. Sarah Frier, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, checks in from the Facebook F8 Conference with news of the social network rolling out a new dating feature. And we Drive to the Close with Aaron Kennon, CEO at Clear Harbor Asset Management. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
